title: Lately I have been losing about 85% of games.
body:
So for the past week or so I've been having serious difficulties with people in my games. In norms I rarely ever lose 50% chance of winning. Lately it's been seriously hard to carry games. I'm not sure if I am bad and can't carry this trash or the team is trash. The other night I wanted one win (not ranked).... I had an 8 loss streak before I could claim the First Win Of The Day Bonus. 

Just now I was just in a game as ww.. It was 12-3 by 12minutes (every lane died every time they were in lane and the jungler had nothing to do with it.) I say nothing and the aatrox who kept feeding riven and the twitch who fed jinx started ganging up on me (basically saying report me and I was so trash and salty and toxic and the worst they've ever seen) and were absolute cunts to me.. I DID NOTHING FUCKING WRONG. NORMALLY I DON'T HAVE A PROBLEM WITH NORMS, you know people just play whatever and chill.. I can not win 2 games of blackmarket brawlers.. After 10 games I finally got my first win... THE EVENT IS ALMOST OVER AND I'M STUCK IN UNCARRIABLE TEAMS.. Don't mean to bitch but fuck this... I've had it for over a week.. Just constant wankers

replies.body:
Salty much
Altho yes I can feel your pain but then I watched this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugXC7g3p0JU
Teamwork OP
An older Riot video
Yeah haha people don't realise dis

The new game mode is crap anyhow, Id suggest changing roles.. When I go on tilt in the jung etc I try play a few ADC matches or top etc. Something totally different.

But yes 70% of people on here are fuck head 13 year olds.

Bro i had the same kind of people in this new game mode, It put me off completely. People that would purposely buy the same minion that you said you would buy or not buy any because they were being royal twats. Very annoying stuff. i just stopped playing it, I loved the idea, i liked the minions but every game i played there was just no teamwork.
Yeah the people playing the gamemode turn to total aids

Going on tilt sucks. Hopefully you find a way to cleanse the salt and rage and play from a refreshing standpoint, getting the 3rd icon before the end of the event.
I would normally say take a few days off to cure the tilt but if your goal is to get those wins then I think you're just going to have to get a duo or trio or premade and "get carried" for the 3rd icon.
I do a lot.. I bring peace and my chi to the table and eventually I just mentally give up after taking so much bullshit. Then go on tilt and have to go on the infinite loop again.. Rip.

I've once lost 30 ranked games in a row, just learn not to rage at anyone and accept the loss. And who cares what some randoms say about you online, as far as I'm concerned their opinions are worth as much as the Catholic Bible to a Muslim.
Yeah you will never get to your destination if you throw stones at every dog that barks:) Thanks, I try be chill but sometimes it's so DAM HARD.. When  it's been so bad for a week or so..

Give League a break. Don't log in. Do something else. Get distracted.

I would say ignore it all together but all this wonderful PBE stuff...certainly not lazy time at Riot.

And stop looking at your match history. It helps.
Thanks for that.. I'll stop. I don't feel it's tilt that is the root cause. I believe I am getting uncarriable toxic people which in turn puts me way off and on tilt. Weird rut
